ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers
Class RulerStyleController

java.lang.Object
  ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers.Controller
      ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers.RulerStyleController

public class RulerStyleController
extends Controller

This class is responsible for controlling access to the ruler style.

Author:
Eric Marinier
